sense.def:
The whole of something
pomeni celoto nečesa.

seg.quote: They're the best in the whole world.
I've never told this to anyone else in my whole life.

sense.def:
A whole
je ena sama stvar, ki obsega več različnih delov.

seg.quote: The earth's weather system is an integrated whole.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
whole
, ni zlomljeno ali poškodovano; knjižna raba.

seg.quote: Fortunately, the plates were still whole.

sense.def:
Whole
pomeni v enem kosu. Na primer, če pogoltnemo
something whole
, nečesa ne zgrizemo na manjše kose.

seg.quote: The snake can swallow a small rat whole.
Charles was a whole lot nicer than I had expected.

sense.def:
Kadar o nečem govorimo
as a whole
, govorimo na splošno kot o samostojni enoti.

seg.quote: Is that just in India, or in the world as a whole?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
on the whole
povemo, da je tisto, kar rečemo, resnično samo na splošno in morda ne v vseh primerih.

seg.quote: On the whole he is a very difficult character.
